portrait_l.name: partner
portrait_l.sjis: ダカラ 私ハ みゅーの様ヲ 守ルタメ！
portrait_l.ascii: I Have Already Informed You I Must Protect Lady Murno

portrait_l.name: partner
portrait_l.sjis: はなさんか！ ワガハイはミューノの様子を
portrait_l.ascii: Let me go! I must check on Murno

portrait_l.name: partner
portrait_l.sjis: はなせ！ 私はあいさつになど
portrait_l.ascii: Let go, you annoyance! I don't need to greet anyone

portrait_l.name: partner
portrait_l.sjis: あのちょっと！ 私、ミューノ様に相談が
portrait_l.ascii: UmPlease let go！ I want to ask Lady Murno something

portrait_l.name: vee
portrait_l.sjis: あー！ それはわかったから
portrait_l.ascii: Yeah~! I totally understand that.
Oh, it's Master and

portrait_r.sjis: もしかして アンタもミューノのところに 行くつもりだった？
portrait_r.ascii: So You were planning to go see Murno too, eh?

portrait_l.sjis: な！ こいつは知らんが 私はミューノのところへなど
portrait_l.ascii: Wha? I don't know about them, but I had no such plans.
I

option.sjis: ミューノのところに行くつもりだった
option.ascii: I was planning to see Murno.

option.sjis: そんな気さらさらありません

male.sjis: みんな帰ってこないし なにやってンのかなって

female.sjis: みんな帰ってこないし なにやってるのかなって

portrait_l.ascii: You were taking a while, so I was wondering what you were doing

portrait_r.name: player
portrait_r.sjis: なるほど、つまり ミューノのことが心配だったと！ へ～、そ～なんだ～
portrait_r.ascii: I see, so in other words, you were worried about Murno! Hehe~I see~

portrait_l.sjis: 用意できたから 玄関で待ってようかなって 思っただけで
portrait_l.ascii: I was just thinking about waiting in the entrance once I was ready

portrait_r.name: player
portrait_r.sjis: はいはい そういうことにしといてあげるよ アタシってばやさしいだろ？
portrait_r.ascii: Ah, yes, yes. I'll leave it at that then. I'm so nice, aren't I?

male.sjis: な、なんだよ！ オレは別に！

female.sjis: な、なによ！ わたしは別に！

portrait_l.ascii: W-What?! I wasn't gonna do anything!

portrait_r.name: vee
portrait_r.sjis: まあまあ アンタたちには悪いけど お姫さまはまだユメの中だよ
portrait_r.ascii: Now, now. I feel sorry for you guys, but your princess is still dreaming.

portrait_r.name: vee
portrait_r.sjis: よっぽど疲れてたんだろうね もう少し寝かしといてやんな
portrait_r.ascii: She must be really tired. Let her sleep for a bit.

portrait_l.ascii: Oh, I see. Alright then.

portrait_l.sjis: 私ハ みゅーの様ガ 起キルマデ 部屋デ 護衛ニアタリマス
portrait_l.ascii: I Will Stand Guard Until She Awakens.

portrait_l.sjis: ミューノがまだ寝ているのなら ワガハイは部屋で護衛を
portrait_l.ascii: Then I'll stand guard in her room

portrait_l.sjis: ならば私も もう少し寝ると
portrait_l.ascii: In that case, I'm going back to sleep too

portrait_l.sjis: ミューノ様がまだ寝ているのなら 私は部屋で護衛を
portrait_l.ascii: Awake or not, my duty is to protect her

portrait_r.name: player
portrait_r.sjis: だ～か～ら！ そんなことしてるヒマがあったら 修行の続きだって言ってるだろ！？
portrait_r.ascii: I~ told~ you! If you've got time for that, then you've got time for training!

portrait_l.ascii: Right now!?

portrait_r.name: player
portrait_r.sjis: アンタもそんなこと言うか！？ この親方不幸弟子！
portrait_r.ascii: You're saying that too, huh?! You're a real worthless apprentice!

portrait_r.name: player
portrait_r.sjis: はやく修理の仕事ができるくらい 使い物になってもらわないと ホント困るンだよ！ お金とか！
portrait_r.ascii: If you don't at least learn to repair things, we'll really be in trouble! Financially!

portrait_l.ascii: Uwah~ This is too real~

portrait_r.name: player
portrait_r.sjis: きびしい現実がわかったら 少しでも修行しな！
portrait_r.ascii: It looks like you understand our situation, so hurry it up!

portrait_l.ascii: Okay!
I'll concede for now
Fine
I understand.
